SELECT tsm.id , tsm.parent_id , tsm.name , tsm.url , tsm.perms , tsm.type , tsm.icon , tsm.order_num , tsm.create_by , tsm.create_time , tsm.last_update_by , tsm.last_update_time , tsm.del_flag FROM t_sys_menu tsm LEFT JOIN t_sys_role_func tsrf ON tsrf.FUNC_ID = tsm.id LEFT JOIN t_sys_user_role tsur ON tsur.ROLE_ID = tsrf.ROLE_ID
and tsur.USER_ID = #{USER_ID}
